CustomField.description: If Rule has Fund associated then take tax exempt flag from Fund's Payor else If Rule has Payor associated then take Payor's tax exempt flag else If Rule has first order, which has Payor association then take Payor's tax exempt flag else Take current account's exempt flag
CustomField.formula: IF((ISPICKVAL(Is_Funded__c, 'True') && NOT(ISBLANK(Account__r.Fund__c))), Account__r.Fund__r.Payor__r.Tax_Exempt__c, IF((ISPICKVAL(Payor_Exist__c, 'True') && NOT(ISBLANK(Account__r.Payor__c))), Account__r.Payor__r.Tax_Exempt__c, IF(NOT(ISBLANK(First_Order__c)) && NOT(ISBLANK(First_Order__r.Payor__c)), First_Order__r.Payor__r.Tax_Exempt__c, Account__r.Tax_Exempt__c )))
CustomField.label: Effective Tax Exempt Flag
